topic.title: Interlaken Lanes Rx to Tx Loopback

body.p: The Interlaken blocks provide an internal Rx to Tx loopback. The data received from the SERDES lanes are looped back to the SERDES lanes. The data may also be forwarded toward the DCPB with normal error checking and handling. The in-band flow control information is embedded in the Interlaken data in the burst control words and is therefore automatically looped back with the data. The flow control loopback allows the remote receive side to throttle the remote transmitter. This prevents remote receiver overflows and allows the Interlaken Internal data loopback to work successfully.
